vclaim: Moving. Indian Army hands over body of 7 year old Abid Sheikh of PoK who drowned in Krishenganga river and the body crossed over to India with flow of the river. Indian Army returned the body within 24hrs today at same spot in Gurez breaking all protocol for humanity. Kudos! pic.twitter.com/sgAaUR7tnN
